{{cpp/experimental/parallel/title|is_execution_policy}}
{{cpp/experimental/parallelism/navbar}}

{{ddcl | header = experimental/execution_policy | since=parallelism_ts | 1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
struct is_execution_policy;
}}

Checks whether {{tt|T}} is a standard or implementation-defined execution policy type.

Provides the member constant {{tt|value}} which is equal to {{c|true}}, if {{tt|T}} is {{tt|execution_policy}}, {{tt|sequential_execution_policy}}, {{tt|parallel_execution_policy}}, {{tt|parallel_vector_execution_policy}}, or an implementation-defined execution policy type. Otherwise, {{tt|value}} is equal to {{c|false}}.

The behavior of a program that adds specializations for {{tt|is_execution_policy}} is undefined.

{{par end}}
